discussion.author: newptcai
discussion.text: Any idea why AutoMerge failed? Is there anything that I need to do?

discussion.author: johnnychen94
discussion.text:
It's highly recommended to read and follow the practice of https://semver.org/ before registering your package.

The name `BEE` isn't appropriate because it's very likely you're the only one that knows what it means.

I believe the appropriate version is `v0.0.1` since your package is pretty new (3 days old).

> https://semver.org/#how-do-i-know-when-to-release-100
> If your software is being used in production, it should probably already be 1.0.0. If you have a stable API on which users have come to depend, you should be 1.0.0. If you’re worrying a lot about backwards compatibility, you should probably already be 1.0.0.

discussion.author: newptcai
discussion.text: Aha, it’s a bit tricky for me to change the name now. I think I will leave it unregistered. Thanks for the advice though. Please close this request then.
